qas.question: Approximately how long did it take to build New Delhi?
The architecture of New Delhi borrows from indigenous sources but fits into what tradition?
What historian is partially responsible for the use of indigenous features in the architecture of New Delhi?
Which government official urged that indigenous features be used in the design of New Delhi?
Many of the architectural elements of New Delhi borrow from what sources?

context: It took about <a0_0>20 years<a0_0/> to build the city from 1911. Many elements of New Delhi architecture borrow from <a4_0>indigenous<a4_0/> sources; however, they fit into a <a1_0>British Classical/Palladian<a1_0/> tradition. The fact that there were any indigenous features in the design were due to the persistence and urging of both the <a3_0>Viceroy Lord Hardinge<a3_0/> and historians like <a2_0>E.B. Havell<a2_0/>.
